d1a73dbb-d6d3-438b-98c2-3cd2ac3e07f7.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated general knowledge of the technology industry. They are able to explain key terms & definitions, stages of development of companies, current challenges and issues, and basic financial concerns. They can speak to the sub vertical industries within the technology sector and why these areas are of critical importance to our Firm.
d1a73dbb-d6d3-438b-98c2-3cd2ac3e07f7.name: Technology Practitioner

badge_template_activities.title: 5 E-learning Modules:  1. Why Armanino in Technology; 2. Evolution of a Technology Company;  3. Sub verticals; 4. Building & Nurturing Relationships in the Technology Sector; 5.Common Issues & Understanding Key Terms
Case Studies.  Participants will read 3 actual Armanino Case Studies.  When presented with a decision, they must make the optimal choice based on what they have learned in the previous modules.
Participants must complete a 30 question assessment with a minimum score of 80% for passage and to receive the Practioner Certificate.

8e900943-0155-4fdd-945d-df35dd40a35c.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated general knowledge of the nonprofit industry. They can explain key terms & definitions, identify different types of nonprofit organizations, identify the differences and similarities between for-profit businesses and not-for-profit organizations, and identify the annual filing and audit requirements for nonprofit organizations. They can speak to why Armanino does business in the nonprofit space and why it’s of critical importance to our Firm.
8e900943-0155-4fdd-945d-df35dd40a35c.name: Nonprofit Practitioner

badge_template_activities.title: 7 E-learning Modules: 1. Why Armanino Nonprofit; 2. Nonprofit Industry Overview; 3. Not-for-Profit Organizations vs. For-Profit Businesses; 4. Nonprofit Financial Reporting; 5. Nonprofit Revenue; 6. Nonprofit Tax; 7. The Nonprofit Regulatory Environment

Case Study: Participants will take a case studies E-Learning module that includes three example case studies in the nonprofit industry. When presented with a decision, they must make the optimal choice based on what they have learned in the program.
Participants must complete a 30 question assessment with a minimum score of 80% for passage and to receive the Practitioner Certificate.

skills.name: Building and Developing Nonprofit Client Relations

e70994d1-27e9-486c-94e4-d5b30eaa000a.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated general knowledge of the real estate industry. They are able to explain key terms & definitions, identify the stages of real estate development projects, understand current challenges and issues in the industry, and identify industry trends. They can define Armanino subverticals and service lines and they can speak to why this Industry is of critical importance to our Firm.
e70994d1-27e9-486c-94e4-d5b30eaa000a.name: Real Estate Practitioner

badge_template_activities.title: 5 E-learning Modules: 1. Introduction to Real Estate; 2. Why Armanino Real Estate?; 3. Introducing the Real Estate Subverticals; 4. Building Relationships in the Real Estate Industry; 5. Armanino Real Estate Service Lines
Case Study: Participants will take a case study E-Learning module on Vista Canyon. When presented with a decision, they must make the optimal choice based on what they have learned in the program.
Participants must complete a 30 question assessment with a minimum score of 80% for passage and to receive the Practitioner Certificate.

skills.name: Building and Developing Relationships in the Real Estate Industry
Real Estate Development Project Life Cycle
